content: 1 sizes recommended yarn one size - 0-3 month 20-24in / 50-60cm plymouth yarn worsted merino gauge techniques 22 sts / 32 row = 4 x 4 in or 10 x 10 cm on us 7 / long tail and backwards-loop cast on 4 5mm needles increases - kfb m1l m1r worked in stockinette decreases - k2tog ssk feel free to change needle size as needed to make for a better fit ribbing materials abbreviation index us 7 / 4 5mm needles - circular or dpns * - * repeat between sts noted times 2 9in / 23cm zippers bor beginning of round stitch markers co cast on yarn needle k knit preferred blocking supplies kfb knit through the front and back - increase 1 optional fabric lining for the zippers st k2tog knit 2 together - decrease 1 st right yarn required leaning m1l make 1 left - increase 1 st left leaning 500yd / 460m worsted weight yarn p purl baby yarn should be soft and breathable pm place marker rs right side sl slip_stitch ssk slip-slip-knit - decrease 1 st left leaning st stitch ws wrong side starfish onesie by @knitsbybethany 2 begin back long-tailed cast on 5 sts pm at end of row and join work in the round note this section of the work will be tight it may be easier to use multiple needles or dpns round 1 *kfb* to end of row you should now have 10 sts round 2 k1 pm *k2 pm* to one before the end of the round k1 round 3 k1 *m1l m1r k2 * repeat until there is one st remaining m1l m1r k1 you should now have 20 sts round 4 k around *round 5 k1 *m1l k to 1 before marker m1r k2* repeat to 3 before end of row m1l k to 1 before marker m1r k1 round 6 k around * rounds 7-48 repeat until you have 48 sts between each marker or 240 sts total at this point the arms legs and head will be separated arm 1 row 1 rs *sl1 ssk k to 3 before marker k2tog k1 turn work row 2 ws sl1 p across turn work * row 3-44 repeat row 1 and 2 decreasing until 4 sts remain on the needle row 45 rs sl1 k across turn work row 46 ws *sl1 p across pick up your slipped edge stitch and purl into the st this will add 1 st turn work row 47 rs sl1 k across pick up and knit 1 st this will add 1 st turn work * row 48-90 repeat row 46 and 47 until you have 48 stitches in this section on your last repeat continue working on the right side head repeat row 1-90 this time also working a 1x1 rib for the last 3 row to prevent curling arm 2 leg 1 leg 2 repeat row 1-90 for the next 3 sections replace bor marker if it was
